trans-unit.source: Enables interaction with the user interface of the development environment object that is hosting the designer.
trans-unit.target: 启用与开发环境对象（正在承载设计器）的用户界面的交互。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> can display error messages, show dialog boxes, and get ambient properties of the host, such as the font for dialog boxes and color schemes, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.Styles%2A> dictionary property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> 可以显示错误消息，显示对话框，并通过如对话框和配色方案的字体获取环境属性的主机，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.Styles%2A>字典属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a designer that provides designer verb menu commands that call methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个设计器，提供了用于调用方法的设计器谓词菜单命令<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>。

trans-unit.source: To use the example, compile the sample code to an assembly, and add a reference to the assembly in a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用示例，编译的程序集的示例代码和在 Windows 窗体应用程序中添加对程序集的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Visual Studio, the `IUIServiceExampleControl` is automatically added to the **Toolbox**.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用 Visual Studio 中，`IUIServiceExampleControl`自动添加到**工具箱**。

trans-unit.source: Add an instance of the `IUIServiceExampleControl` to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 将的一个实例添加`IUIServiceExampleControl`到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: To access the designer verb commands that invoke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> methods, either right-click on the control's surface or click on the control's smart tag glyph and select an item from the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问设计器谓词命令，以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>方法，或者在控件的图面上右键单击或单击控件的智能标记标志符号和从智能标记面板中选择一个项目。

trans-unit.source: The component to check for support for displaying a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" />.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其是否支持显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" /> 的组件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the component can display a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" />.
trans-unit.target: 指示该组件是否可显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified component can display a component editor form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的组件可以显示组件编辑器窗体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Component editors can display a component editor form that is similar to a property page from the Component Object Model (COM).
trans-unit.target: 组件编辑器可以显示类似于属性页从组件对象模型 (COM) 的组件编辑器窗体。

trans-unit.source: This method checks to determine whether the specified component has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor> that can display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查，以确定是否具有指定的组件<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor>可以显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the window that should be used as the owner when showing dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 获取在显示对话框时应该用作所有者的窗口。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> that indicates the window to own any child dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" />，指示窗口拥有任何子对话框。

trans-unit.source: Some dialog boxes are parented to an owner application and are not visible in the task list.
trans-unit.target: 某些对话框父级的所有者应用程序和在任务列表中不可见。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window> that indicates the window that should be the owner for dialog boxes of this sort that are spawned from an integrated development environment.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window>，该值指示应从集成的开发环境生成的对话框，此类的所有者窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag indicating the UI has changed.
trans-unit.target: 设置指示 UI 已更改的标志。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that the UI has been changed and should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示 UI 已更改，并且应将其刷新。

trans-unit.source: It is important to indicate the need for a refresh whenever a toolbar or menu item's status changes.
trans-unit.target: 请务必指示需要刷新，当工具栏或菜单项的状态发生更改。

trans-unit.source: Most development environments cache the status of these elements for speed, and need to know when they need to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 大多数开发环境中缓存的速度，这些元素的状态，并且需要知道在需要进行更新时。

trans-unit.source: This method is called, for example, after objects have been selected within designer view to enable the cut and copy menu items.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法，例如，若要启用剪切和复制菜单项的设计器视图中所选对象后时。

trans-unit.source: The component for which to display a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" />.
trans-unit.target: 要为其显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" /> 的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> to parent any dialog boxes to.
trans-unit.target: 要成为任何对话框的父级的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to display a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" /> for a component.
trans-unit.target: 尝试显示组件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attempt is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此尝试成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> is similar to a property page from the Component Object Model (COM).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>类似于属性页从组件对象模型 (COM)。

trans-unit.source: If the component does not support component editors, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果组件不支持组件编辑器<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this, be sure to call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.CanShowComponentEditor%2A> first.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，请务必调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.CanShowComponentEditor%2A>第一个。

trans-unit.source: The component does not support component editors.
trans-unit.target: 组件不支持组件编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to display the specified form in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在对话框中显示指定的窗体。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> values indicating the result code returned by the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> 值之一，指示由对话框返回的结果代码。

trans-unit.source: The following code example attempts to obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> class and invoke the service's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例尝试获取的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>类并调用该服务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified error message in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示指定的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified exception and information about the exception in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示指定的异常和有关该异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: Using this method enables the message box display to be properly integrated with the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法允许消息框显示要正确地与开发环境集成。

trans-unit.source: The error message to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified error message in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示指定的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Using this method enables the message box display to be properly integrated with the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法允许消息框显示要正确地与开发环境集成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: A message to display that provides information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的消息，提供异常相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified exception and information about the exception in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示指定的异常和有关该异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: Using this method enables the message box display to be properly integrated with the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法允许消息框显示要正确地与开发环境集成。

trans-unit.source: The following code example attempts to obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> and invoke the service's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowError%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例尝试获取的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>并调用该服务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowError%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified message in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message to display
trans-unit.target: 要显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified message in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures that the display of the message box is properly integrated with the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确保在消息框显示正确集成开发环境。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowMessage%2A> method to display a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowMessage%2A>方法以显示一个消息框。

trans-unit.source: The message to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caption for the message box.
trans-unit.target: 消息框的标题。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified message in a message box with the specified caption.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的标题在消息框中显示指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures that the display of the message box is properly integrated with the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确保在消息框显示正确集成开发环境。

trans-unit.source: The following code example attempts to obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> and invoke the service's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例尝试获取的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>并调用该服务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowMessage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The message to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caption for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 用于对话框的标题。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons" /> values: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.OK" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.OKCancel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.OK" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.OKCancel" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified message in a message box with the specified caption and buttons to place on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的标题和要在对话框上放置的按钮在消息框中显示指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> values indicating the result code returned by the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> 值之一，指示由对话框返回的结果代码。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures that the display of the message box is properly integrated with the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确保在消息框显示正确集成开发环境。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowMessage%2A> method to display a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowMessage%2A>方法以显示一个消息框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> identifier for the tool window.
trans-unit.target: 工具窗口的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: This can be a custom <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> or one of the predefined values from <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardToolWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是自定义的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，或来自 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardToolWindows" /> 的预定义值之一。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified tool window.
trans-unit.target: 显示指定的工具窗口。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the tool window was successfully shown; <see langword="false" /> if it could not be shown or found.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功显示了工具窗口，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果未能显示或找到工具窗口，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example attempts to obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> and invoke the service's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowToolWindow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例尝试获取的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>并调用该服务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService.ShowToolWindow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of styles that are specific to the host's environment.
trans-unit.target: 获取特定于宿主环境的样式集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing style settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含样式设置的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary can provide information from the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 字典可以提供从主机环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: At a minimum, this consists of the font that should be used for standard UI text, and the color to use for highlighting.
trans-unit.target: 至少，这包含应使用的标准 UI 文本和颜色用于突出显示的字体。

trans-unit.source: These required styles are "DialogFont" and "HighlightColor".
trans-unit.target: 以下所需的样式是"DialogFont"和"突出显示的颜色"。

trans-unit.source: The values for these styles may be retrieved by using the style as a key for the dictionary, accessing the dictionary using the key as an indexer.
trans-unit.target: 作为字典，访问使用密钥作为索引器的字典键使用样式，来检索这些样式的值。

trans-unit.source: For example: (object implementing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>).Styles[(style name string in quotes)].
trans-unit.target: 例如: (对象实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService>)。样式 [（样式名称字符串用引号引起来）]。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the dialog box font from the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例从宿主环境中获取的对话框字体。
